title: 131. How to Own Your Magnetism Using Astrology
itunes:title: How to Own Your Magnetism Using Astrology
description:
In this episode of the Self Love Fix podcast, we’re continuing our astrology series and diving into rising signs. 

Understanding what your rising sign means, how it makes you magnetic and lovable, and figuring out all the ways it affects your life is both interesting and useful. 

In this episode we cover:

  • What’s A Rising Sign?
  • Rising Signs and Appearance Magnetism 
  • Rising Signs and Personality Magnetism 
  • Rising Signs and Leadership Magnetism
  • Rising Signs and the Path to Your Purpose

No matter which rising sign represents you, there’s something for you to learn about yourself and your natural tendencies in this episode!

If you liked this episode of the podcast, take a screenshot, head on over to my Instagram and share it on your IG stories and tag me, @theselflovefix

If you love what you learned, be sure to hit that follow button so you never miss a future episode, and make sure to leave a review to help me reach more listeners just like you looking to follow their inner truth and live a life of abundance & authentic self-love.

 

CONNECT WITH BEATRICE:

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/theselflovefix 

Website: http://www.beatricekamau.com 

 

EPISODE RESOURCES:

Sign up to the Owning Your Magnetism Masterclass by 11/12/21 11:59 PM PST to get your bonus mini-course, Re-mothering Using Astrology: https://beatricekamau.com/oym
